metadata.fullname: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
metadata.description: PCI DSS is a security standard for organizations that handle credit card information. It includes 12 requirements organized into 6 control objectives to ensure cardholder data protection. This assessment covers technical controls that can be automatically verified in AWS environments.
